title: All Pick URF for april fools?
body: I loved having random urf, don't get me wrong but I would love to have at least 1 weekend where I can pick who I play. Maybe give more bans or just perma ban the champs we see every game after a couple days or something. These are probably terrible ideas but I wanted to throw it out there.

replies.body: In honor of the challenger vlad main who got an Octakill in urf, let's do  Octakill urf on summoner's rift.
will probably be poro king with warps for April Fools I'm sorry
with straight up 10 bans before you get to pick would be great
I would have to agree, 10 bans would be enough to get rid of the over played people, such as fiora, eve, ect.

all for one random urf with bans.

clown fiesta and fast games. perhaps too unbalanced?
